GK16bhakavpu:799: avastukaṃ cedvitathaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tattvavṛtti hi // Bh_5.8 //
GK16bhakavpu:815: tadvido nāntarīyārtha- darśanaṃ cāpare viduḥ // Bh_5.11 //
GK16bhakavpu:821: prasiddhadharmā pratyakṣa- bādhinī ceti duṣyati // Bh_5.13 //
GK16bhakavpu:842: yathā śucistanustrīṇi pramāṇāni na santi vā // Bh_5.18 //
GK16bhakavpu:843: % śucastanustrīṇi pramāṇāni na santi vā] / edM/
GK16bhakavpu:844: edBGa; śucistanuḥ straiṇī tatpramāṇāni santi vā /
GK16bhakavpu:849: yathā śīto 'nalo nāsti rūpamuṣṇaḥ kṣapākaraḥ // Bh_5.20 //
GK16bhakavpu:873: %% Purport: anugati and vyāvṛtti are required respectively in 2 things (viz. pakṣa and sapakṣa)
GK16bhakavpu:878: khyāpyate yena dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa kilānyairdvidhocyate // Bh_5.27 //
GK16bhakavpu:888: tāsāṃ prapañco bahudhā bhūyastvādiha noditaḥ // Bh_5.29 //
GK16bhakavpu:890: idaṃ tu śāstragarbheṣu kāvyeṣvabhihitaṃ yathā // Bh_5.30 //
GK16bhakavpu:892: kāraṇaṃ cenna tannityaṃ nityaṃ cetkāraṇaṃ na tat // Bh_5.31 //
GK16bhakavpu:906: sadaiva vāri sindhūnām aho sthemā mahārciṣaḥ // Bh_5.34 //
GK16bhakavpu:909: rūpādīnāṃ yathā dravyam āśrayo naśyatīti ca /
GK16bhakavpu:927: kṛtvā pratijñāṃ vatsena hṛteti madanāśrayā // Bh_5.38 //
GK16bhakavpu:929: pratijñāya yathā bhīmas taccakārāvaśo ruṣā // Bh_5.39 //
GK16bhakavpu:930: kāryo 'nyatra pratijñāyāḥ prayogo na kathaṃ cana /
GK16bhakavpu:941: pituḥ priyāya yāṃ bhīṣmaś cakre sā kāmabādhinī // Bh_5.43 //
GK16bhakavpu:943: jāmadagnyaṃ yudhā jitvā sā jñeyā kopabādhinī // Bh_5.44 //
GK16bhakavpu:951: ko vā gatvaramarthibhyo na yacchati dhanaṃ laghu // Bh_5.46 //
GK16bhakavpu:952: kimityayaṃ tu yaḥ kṣepaḥ saukaryaṃ darśayatyasau /
GK16bhakavpu:957: kūjanātkurarīṇāṃ ca kamalānāṃ ca saurabhāt // Bh_5.48 //
GK16bhakavpu:1002: mukhaṃ padmamivetyatra kiṃ sādhyaṃ kiṃ ca sādhanam // Bh_5.56 //
GK16bhakavpu:1005: śreyān vṛddhānuśiṣṭatvāt pūrve kṛtayuge yathā // Bh_5.57 //
GK16bhakavpu:1011: tvameva vīra pradyumnas tvameva naravāhanaḥ // Bh_5.59 //
GK16bhakavpu:1022: kāvyaṃ kapitthamāmaṃ yat keṣāṃcittādṛśaṃ yathā // Bh_5.62 //
GK16bhakavpu:1031: ahighnapadmasya jalāridhāmnas tavaiva nānyasya sutasya vṛttam // Bh_5.63 //
GK16bhakavpu:1040: bahukusumavibhūṣite sa tasthau suramunisiddhayute sumerupṛṣṭhe // Bh_5.65 //
GK16bhakavpu:1049: śaṅkhavrātākulo 'ntastimimakarakulākīrṇavīcīpratāno dadhre yasyāmburāśiḥ śaśikumudasudhākṣīraśuddhāṃ sukīrtim // Bh_5.68 //
GK16bhakavpu:1055: iti nigaditāstāstā vācāmalaṅkṛtayo mayā bahuvidhakṛtīrdṛṣṭvānyeṣāṃ svayaṃ paritarkya ca /
GK16bhakavpu:1056: prathitavacasaḥ santo 'bhijñāḥ pramāṇamihāpare gurutaradhiyāmasvārādhaṃ mano 'kṛtabuddhibhiḥ // Bh_5.69 //
GK16bhakavpu:1066: śabdaratnaṃ svayaṃgamyam alaṃ kartumayaṃ janam // Bh_6.3 //
GK16bhakavpu:1069: tasya cādhigame yatnaḥ kāryaṃ kāvyaṃ vidhitsatā /
GK16bhakavpu:1070: parapratyayato yattu kriyate tena kā ratiḥ // Bh_6.4 //
GK16bhakavpu:1082: varṇānāṃ kramavṛttitvān nyāyā nāpi ca saṃhatiḥ // Bh_6.9 //
GK16bhakavpu:1087: tasmātkūṭastha ityeṣā śābdī vaḥ kalpanā vṛthā /
GK16bhakavpu:1092: vyavahārāya lokasya prāgitthaṃ samayaḥ kṛtaḥ // Bh_6.13 //
GK16bhakavpu:1095: vinaśvaro 'stu nityo vā sambandho 'rthena vā satā /
GK16bhakavpu:1096: namo 'stu tebhyo vidvadbhyaḥ pramāṇaṃ ye 'sya niścitau // Bh_6.15 //
GK16bhakavpu:1105: janako gavi gobuddher mṛgyatāmaparo dhvaniḥ // Bh_6.17 //
GK16bhakavpu:1107: apavādavidhijñāne phale caikasya vaḥ katham // Bh_6.18 //
GK16bhakavpu:1111: ke śabdāḥ kiṃ ca tadvācyam ityaho vartma dustaram // Bh_6.20 //
GK16bhakavpu:1118: vakravācāṃ kavīnāṃ ye prayogaṃ prati sādhavaḥ /
GK16bhakavpu:1119: prayoktuṃ ye na yuktāśca tadviveko 'yamucyate // Bh_6.23 //
GK16bhakavpu:1121: tulyārthatve 'pi hi brūyāt ko hantiṃ gativācinam // Bh_6.24 //
GK16bhakavpu:1122: śrautrādiṃ na tu durbodhaṃ na duṣṭādimapeśalam /
GK16bhakavpu:1125: grāmyaṃ na piṇḍīśūrādiṃ na ḍitthādimapārthakam // Bh_6.25 //
GK16bhakavpu:1127: na leśajñāpakākṛṣṭaṃ sa hanti dhyāti vā yathā // Bh_6.26 //
GK16bhakavpu:1131: chandovaditi cotsargān na cāpi cchāndasaṃ vadet // Bh_6.27 //
GK16bhakavpu:1136: tamādriyeta prāyeṇa na tu yogavibhāgajam // Bh_6.29 //
GK16bhakavpu:1138: asyāṃ suvarṇālaṃkāraḥ puṣṇāti nitarāṃ śriyam // Bh_6.30 //
GK16bhakavpu:1141: sarūpaśeṣaṃ tu pumān striyā yatra ca śiṣyate /
GK16bhakavpu:1142: yathāha varuṇāvindrau bhavau śarvau mṛḍāviti // Bh_6.32 //
GK16bhakavpu:1148: yathā vidvānadhīte 'sau tiṣṭhadgu ca vahadgu ca // Bh_6.35 //
GK16bhakavpu:1152: akena ca na kurvīta vṛttiṃ tadgamako yathā // Bh_6.37 //
GK16bhakavpu:1153: pañcarājīti ca yathā prayuñjīta dviguṃ striyām /
GK16bhakavpu:1156: priyonmanāyate sā te kiṃ śaṭhābhimanāyase // Bh_6.39 //
GK16bhakavpu:1157: tṛtīyaikavacaḥ ṣaṣṭhyām āmantaṃ ca vadet kvipi /
GK16bhakavpu:1163: puṃsi striyāṃ ca kvasvantam icchantyacchāndasaṃ kila /
GK16bhakavpu:1164: upeyuṣāmapi divaṃ yathā na vyeti cārutā // Bh_6.42 //
GK16bhakavpu:1182: tasya hārī stanābhogo vadanaṃ hāri sundaram /
GK16bhakavpu:1183: hāriṇī tanuratyantaṃ kiyanna harate manaḥ // Bh_6.47 //
GK16bhakavpu:1192: śākārau jāguriṣṭau ca jāgaryā jāgarā yathā // Bh_6.49 //
GK16bhakavpu:1195: lyuṭaṃ ca kartṛviṣayaṃ devano ramaṇo yathā // Bh_6.50 //
GK16bhakavpu:1199: añmahārajanāllākṣā- rocanābhyāṃ tathā ca ṭhak // Bh_6.51 //
GK16bhakavpu:1201: ḍmatubiṣṭaṃ ca kumudād yatheyaṃ bhūḥ kumudvatī /
GK16bhakavpu:1202: ṭhak cāpi tena jayatīty ākṣikaḥ śāstriko yathā // Bh_6.52 //
GK16bhakavpu:1204: tataśchamiṣṭyā ca yathā sārvaḥ sarvīya ityapi // Bh_6.53 //
GK16bhakavpu:1214: inacca phalabarhābhyāṃ phalino barhiṇo yathā // Bh_6.56 //
GK16bhakavpu:1215: iniḥ prayuktaḥ prāyeṇa tathā ṭhaṃśca manīṣibhiḥ /
GK16bhakavpu:1216: tatrāpi mekhālāmālā- māyānāṃ sutarāṃ matau // Bh_6.57 //
GK16bhakavpu:1222: asau dadhadalaṃkāraṃ srajaṃ bibhracca śobhate // Bh_6.59 //
GK16bhakavpu:1235: śabdārṇavasya yadi kaścidupaiti pāraṃ bhīmāmbhasaśca jaladheriti vismayo 'sau // Bh_6.62 //
GK16bhakavpu:1236: vidyānāṃ satatamapāśrayo 'parāsāṃ tāsūktānna ca viruṇaddhi kāṃścidarthān /
GK16bhakavpu:1239: śraddheyaṃ jagati mataṃ hi pāṇinīyaṃ mādhyasthyādbhavati na kasyacitpramāṇam // Bh_6.63 //
GK16bhakavpu:1240: avalokya matāni satkavīnām avagamya svadhiyā ca kāvyalakṣma /
GK16bhakavpu:1252: ṣaṣṭyā śabdasya śuddhiḥ syād ityevaṃ vastupañcakam /
GK16bhakavpu:1255: uktaṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ paricchedair bhāmahena krameṇa vaḥ // Bh_6.66 //
